page.title: 19A Schoolchild's Timetable.
page.content: {0750}Get up and clean teeth.{0800 Get dressed and have breakfast.{0830 Go to school.{0832}Put out chairs in classroom and in the hall.{0850}Go out and talk.{0900}Bell rings, come in for Registration.{0910}Go to Assembly, sing a song, hear a story.{0930 English work.{1030}Break, play ball games.{1045}Maths.{1200}Lunch.{1300 Bell rings for end of lunch and then we have a story, have Physical Education and do Handwriting.{1415 until{1430}Break. Then we have Swimming, Games or Music.{1530}Go home.{1600}Watch T.V.{1700}Go out and play.{1800}Watch the News on T.V. and have Tea. To relax I play Squash.{2000 I go home and shower.{2145}Clean out my Hamster.{2200}Bed. As you can see, in{1985}time governs our lives. At the weekend we can relax and forget the clock.
